content: Certificate name does not match hostname

comment.text: "This translation key is used to display an error message when a certificate's common name does not match its hostname in the LDAP settings. It appears in a Certificate Dialog, specifically as an option for an error type."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Το όνομα του πιστοποιητικού δεν ταιριάζει με το όνομα κεντρικού υπολογιστή' while understandable, is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. 'Hostname' is often translated as 'όνομα τομέα' (domain name) in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Το όνομα του πιστοποιητικού δεν ταιριάζει με το όνομα τομέα

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Վկայագրի անունը չի համընկնում հյուրընկալողի անվան հետ' is a literal translation of 'Certificate name does not match hostname'. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural Armenian phrasing might be better for a user interface message. 'Հյուրընկալողի անվան հետ' (with the hostname) can be slightly ambiguous; it could refer to the server itself or just the hostname part.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more user-friendly alternative, such as: 'Վկայագրի անունը չի համապատասխանում դոմենային անվան հետ' (Certificate name does not match domain name) or 'Վկայագրի անունը չի համապատասխանում կայքի դոմենային անվան հետ' (Certificate name does not match website domain name).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ຊື່ໃບຢັ້ງຢືນບໍ່ຕົັ້ງກັນກັບຊື່ເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ' is a literal translation but could be more natural. 'ເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ' translates to 'server', but 'hostname' specifically refers to the name assigned to a server. A more accurate and natural phrasing would involve directly mentioning the hostname.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ຊື່ໃບຢັ້ງຢືນບໍ່ຕົັ້ງກັນກັບຊື່ໂດເມນ' (Certificate name does not match domain name) or 'ຊື່ໃບຢັ້ງຢືນບໍ່ຕົັ້ງກັນກັບຊື່ເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍທີ່ໃຊ້ງານ' (Certificate name does not match the hostname in use).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Sertifikāta nosaukums neatbilst resursdatora nosaukumam" is a literal translation of 'Certificate name does not match hostname'. While technically correct, 'resursdatora' isn't the most common or natural way to refer to a hostname in Latvian. A more natural phrasing would incorporate the concept of a server or domain.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sertifikāta nosaukums nesakrīt ar servera nosaukumu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'nesakrīt' is accurate, a more fluent and commonly used alternative could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sertifikāta nosaukums nav saderīgs ar servera nosaukumu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Nume de certificat nu se potrivește cu nume de gazdă' is a literal translation but might not be the most natural way to express this in Romanian. A more idiomatic translation would be 'Numele certificatului nu corespunde cu numele domeniului' or 'Certificatul nu are un nume corespunzător domeniului'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Certificatul nu are un nume corespunzător domeniului

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'පරිදිපාන නම සත්කාරක නම සමඟ නොගැලපේ' is a literal translation and doesn't convey the natural meaning of 'Certificate name does not match hostname'. A more idiomatic translation would be better. 'Certificate name' is typically referred to as 'සertificate' in technical Sinhala contexts, or a more descriptive term depending on the audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like: 'සertificate එකේ නම සත්කාරකයේ නම සමඟ නොගැලපේ' or 'සertificate නම සත්කාරකයේ නම සමඟ නොගැලපේ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Име сертификата се не поклапа са именом хоста" is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Serbian. It emphasizes the 'not matching' aspect too much. A more natural phrasing would be more idiomatic.

The translation 'Ime sertifikata se ne poklapa sa imenom hosta' is technically correct, but sounds a bit awkward in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Naziv sertifikata ne odgovara imenu hosta' or 'Sertifikat ime ne odgovara imenu hosta'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Naziv sertifikata ne odgovara imenu hosta
